ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-E (P4), Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Spacecraft measured Electric Field

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: THEMIS-E: Electric Field Instrument, EFI, Electric Field Measurements. The L2 Product is a 3D Estimate of the perpnedicular Electric Field, Eperp, derived from the Spin Plane E-Field Measurements assuming E ⋅ B = 0, using relevant Flux-Gate Magnetometer, FGM, Data. This Data Product includes Spin-Averaged, and Fast Survey Field Data. The Spin-Averaged Data, EFS_DOT0, has approximately 3 s Time Resolution. Fast Survey, EFF_DOT0, Data has 0.125 s Time Resolution.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: V. Angelopoulos, J. Bonnell, F. Mozer, NASA Contract NAS5-02099. Open Data for Scientific Use.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Angelopoulos, Vassilis; Bonnell, John, W.; Mozer, Forrest, S.
PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Space Physics Data Facility; University of California, Berkeley

NumericalData.Caveats: Measurements on the Axial booms, 5 and 6, may have large Errors due to their Proximity to the Spacecraft as the Axial Booms are much shorter than other Booms. The Spin Plane Booms for THEMIS were not deployed until January 14, 2008 at 1700 UT. Any EFI Measurements obtained prior to this Date and Time should not be used. See the THEMIS Website for more Information.

Parameter.Name: Epoch for Electric Field, Slow Survey using E⋅B=0, 3 s
Parameter.Description: Epoch for Electric Field Vector, Slow Survey using E⋅B=0, 3 s Data
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: the_efs_dot0_epoch0, the_efs_dot0_time.

Parameter.Description: Electric Field Vector, Slow Survey using E⋅B=0, Geocentric Solar Ecliptic, GSE, Cartesian Coordinates, 3 s Data
Parameter.Caveats: Units are in mV/m Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Magnitude Data Quality Parameter
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THE_EFF_Q_MAG_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Vector Magnitude Data Quality Parameter, equal to the Spin-Fit Short Boom DC-Coupled E34 Channel Electric Field Magnitude divided by the Spin-Fit Long Boom DC-Coupled E12 Channel Electric Field Magnitude: Good Values are near 1.0
Parameter.Caveats: No Units

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, UTC, for Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Magnitude Data Quality Parameter, 3 s
Parameter.Description: Time, UTC, in Seconds since 1970-01-01, for Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Vector Magnitude Data Quality Parameter, 3 s Data
Parameter.Caveats: Unleaped seconds

Parameter.Name: Epoch for Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Magnitude Data Quality Parameter, 3 s
Parameter.Description: Epoch for Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Vector Magnitude Data Quality Parameter, 3 s Data
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: the_eff_dot0_epoch0, the_eff_q_mag_time.

Parameter.Name: Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Phase Data Quality Parameter
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THE_EFF_Q_PHA_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Vector Phase Data Quality Parameter, equal to the Cosine of the Angle between the Spin-Fit Short Boom DC-Coupled E34 Channel Electric Field Vector and the Spin-Fit Long Boom DC-Coupled E12 Channel Electric Field Vector, Good Values are near 1.0
Parameter.Caveats: No Units

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, UTC, for Spin Plane Electric Field, Fast Survey Ground Spin-Fit, Phase Data Quality Parameter, 3 s
